Requirements¶

  • poetry has poetry-auto-export plugin configured in poetry.lock

  • API key from Randommer.io

docker-python-base documentation¶

main.py¶

Core python file that runs the application

app.main.hello_world(name: str = 'World')¶

Example of Hello World that has a paramater to display for auto-doc

Parameters:

name (str, optional) – Name value. Defaults to “World”.

app.main.main()¶

Main function, core logic of the application

util.py¶

Collection of utilities to use in an application

app.modules.api.util.GET_page(url: str, api_key: str | None = None) → str¶

Send a GET request to a URL and return the response as text

Parameters:

  • url (str) – URL to send a GET request to

  • api_key (Optional[str], optional) – Randommer.io API key. Defaults to None.

Returns:

HTTP GET response as text

Return type:

str
